intervention_coordinates_heading_check.name: intervention_coordinates_heading_check
intervention_coordinates_heading_check.value: heading IS NULL OR (heading >= 0 AND heading < 360)

planted_species_survival_rate_check.name: planted_species_survival_rate_check
planted_species_survival_rate_check.value: survival_rate IS NULL OR (survival_rate >= 0 AND survival_rate <= 100)

interventions_success_rate_check.name: interventions_success_rate_check
interventions_success_rate_check.value: success_rate IS NULL OR (success_rate >= 0 AND success_rate <= 100)

interventions_survival_rate_check.name: interventions_survival_rate_check
interventions_survival_rate_check.value: survival_rate IS NULL OR (survival_rate >= 0 AND survival_rate <= 100)

monitoring_schedules_custom_frequency_ch.name: monitoring_schedules_custom_frequency_check
monitoring_schedules_custom_frequency_ch.value: (frequency != 'custom') OR (custom_frequency_days IS NOT NULL AND custom_frequency_days > 0)

monitoring_schedules_date_range_check.name: monitoring_schedules_date_range_check
monitoring_schedules_date_range_check.value: end_date IS NULL OR end_date >= start_date

site_reports_survival_rate_check.name: site_reports_survival_rate_check
site_reports_survival_rate_check.value: overall_survival_rate IS NULL OR (overall_survival_rate >= 0 AND overall_survival_rate <= 100)

site_species_survival_rate_check.name: site_species_survival_rate_check
site_species_survival_rate_check.value: survival_rate IS NULL OR (survival_rate >= 0 AND survival_rate <= 100)

sites_survival_rate_check.name: sites_survival_rate_check
sites_survival_rate_check.value: survival_rate IS NULL OR (survival_rate >= 0 AND survival_rate <= 100)

tree_records_temperature_check.name: tree_records_temperature_check
tree_records_temperature_check.value: temperature IS NULL OR (temperature >= -50 AND temperature <= 60)
